Ships in class of the MRCV will take on the names of the 6 [Victory-class missile corvettes](/wiki/Victory-class_corvette). RSS *Sea Scorpion* (P81) ### [Independence-class patrol craft](/wiki/Independence-class_patrol_craft) - RSS *Independence* - RSS *Freedom* - RSS *Justice* - RSS *Sovereignty* - RSS *Daring* - RSS *Dauntless* ### [Swift-class coastal patrol craft](/wiki/Swift-class_coastal_patrol_craft) - RSS Swift Knight (P11) - RSS Swift Lancer (P12) - RSS Swift Swordsman (P14) - RSS Swift Warrior (P15) - RSS Swift Archer (P16) - RSS Swift Warlord (P17) - RSS Swift Combatant (P18) - RSS Swift Challenger (P19) - RSS Swift Cavalier (P20) - RSS Swift Conqueror (P21) - RSS Swift Centurion (P22) - RSS Swift Chieftain (P23) ### [*County*-class landing ship tank](/wiki/Tank_landing_ship) - [RSS *Endurance* (L201)](/wiki/USS_Holmes_County_(LST-836)) - [RSS *Excellence* (L202)](/wiki/USS_LST-629) - [RSS *Intrepid* (L203)](/wiki/USS_LST-579) - [RSS *Resolution* (L204)](/wiki/USS_LST-649) - [RSS *Persistence* (L205)](/wiki/USS_LST-613) ### [*Sir Lancelot*-class landing ship logistic](/wiki/Round_Table-class_landing_ship_logistics) - [RSS *Perseverance* (L206)](/wiki/RFA_Sir_Lancelot) ### [*Bluebird*-class minesweeper](/wiki/Bluebird-class_minesweeper) - [RSS *Jupiter* (M101)](/wiki/USS_Whippoorwill_(AMS-207)) - [RSS *Mercury* (M102)](/wiki/USS_Thrasher_(AMS-203)) ### Singapore Naval Volunteer Force (Straits Settlement Royal Volunteer Naval Reserves) - [RSS *Panglima*](/wiki/RSS_Panglima) - 75' motor launch built in Singapore by [Thornycroft](/wiki/John_I._Thornycroft_%26_Company) in 1937 and sunk in 1942 - 90' motorized fishing vessel built in England for RN c. 1944 and delivered 1948. Retired as wooden hull rotting out. - 117' built by United Engineering Limited of Singapore c. 1956; P68 retired in 1991. - RSS *Bedok* - Police patrol craft taken over by SNV in 1966 - [RSS *Singapura*](/wiki/Japanese_minelayer_Wakataka) - Saunders, Stephen, Commodore, RN, Ed. *Jane's Fighting Ships, 107th Edition, 2004-2005*. Alexandria, Virginia: Jane's Information Group, 2004. [ISBN](/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)) 0-7106-2623-1. - Saunders, Stephen, Commodore, RN, Ed. *Jane's Fighting Ships, 111th Edition, 2008-2009*. Alexandria, Virginia: Jane's Information Group, 2004. [ISBN](/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)) 978-0-7106-2845-9.
title: List of ships of the Republic of Singapore Navy
